@IntenseGamer123

Not that BS. I know people who've spent more than that, because they have the cash, they liked the game, and it's cheaper than a movie. More fun too.

Even in OCE there's people who would spend that, and if TT were up more often, and Dom in at all, then I'd likely spend my entertainment money on LoL.

But no TT, no cash.
thats bs

Sad moment when you look at the 5th sale schedule of 2015 and still not find Battlecast Urgot... {{item:3070}} {{item:3070}} {{item:3070}} 

No, but really, i've been waiting for that skin to be on sale for 11 months now...
Could be worse, you could be waiting for a skin to go on sale for over a year... And then miss the sale anyway.
